name: Expedition Mars
description:
What challenges await a mission to Mars?

Expedition Mars is a puzzle game that ventures into different types of puzzles for the player to explore. The game uses a realistic idea of what will be needed for a Mars mission, teaches the player about some of the challenges and technologies required for this to occur, and targets anyone interested in spaceflight and puzzle games. 

1st Place Rhode Island TSA Video Game Design Competition 2023.
